text: now all of this started when photographs
of these naked tourists were taken were
circulating online showing them naked
near the peak of Mount Kinabalu which is
considered sacred for locals here
there's lots of indigenous groups in
Saba States and they believe it's the
final resting spot for the spirits of
their ancestors and the deputy chief
minister of Saba had said that he saw a
direct correlation a direct link between
the actions of these tourists and the
earthquake a few days later which killed
18 people including schoolchildren well
not all Malaysians of course agree with
this but they do believe that these
foreigners had acted with entitlement
and that they should be punished because
Saba Parks officials have accused these
foreigners of not only stripping but
also urinating and then cursing at one
of their staff members right you can
understand that there is unacceptable
behavior there there is a line also here
Jennifer's saying that they've been told
either three months trail or 10 buffalo
heads for sacrifice is that right well
that is a suggestion from one of the
native tribe leaders but of course
they're now being held in detention and
they're possibly facing a charge of
public indecency which could mean jail
of up to three months a fine or even
possibly both of course this suggestion
about buffalo heads I mean this comes
from the native tribe customary
traditions it's not clear whether
foreigners are subject to this but if
certainly there are calls for them to be
also tried under traditional native laws
their lawyer says that they seem to be
holding up well but as you can imagine
they are very frightened for pulling
